column1: Christina Williams, Morgan Warwick & Angela White
07/04/1958 0 Born in Fort Payne, Alabama as Sheila Kaye Bailey
1960-1961 2-3 Sexual abuse by father and family friend
1964 6 Violent physical abuse by father to Shelia, her sister, and their mother
05/21/1976 18 Graduated from Fort Payne High School
12/14/1982 24 Filed for divorce from James Baxter
Moved to Epping, New Hampshire and began living with Dr. Wilfred LaBarre
Spring 1987 27 whom she met after she place a personal ad. She quit using the name Bailey
Sheila files an assault report with the Epping police accusing Wayne Ennis of
01/15/1995 33 attacking her. She is given a restraining order. Sheila had known Ennis for
years and still occasionally had sex with him.
08/22/1995 34 Wayne Ennis and Sheila get married in York, Maine
12/28/1996 35 Sheila files report that Wayne Ennis beat her
Dec. 1996 35 Marriage between Wayne and Sheila ends
04/02/1997 38 Sheila granted a restraining order against Wayne.
09/25/1998 37 Sheila charged with assault against boyfriend, 27-year old James Brackett
12/02/2000 42 Sheila’s common-law husband Dr. Wilfred LaBarre dies
2002 43 Sheila assaults Brackett by trying to run him over with a car
2003 43 Sheila scratched and gouged Brackett’s face and fired a gun at him
2004 43 Michael Deloge moved to Sheila’s farm
Fall 2005 44 Michael Deloge murdered by Sheila

column3: Sheila meets Kenneth Countie through a dating service
Went to Wal-Mart with Kenneth Countie complaining of an assault on him
Sheila calls sister Lynn ranting about how Kenny has demonic eyes and she isscared, accusing him of being a pedophile
Sheila and Kenneth go to Wal-Mart, this time Kenneth looks sickly and abused
Last time Kenneth Countie was seen in public
Sheila calls police dept and tells secretary Kenneth left her

Officers arrive at Sheila’s Farm to conduct a well being check on KennethCountie to find piles burning with bones sticking out and Sheila calls policeand plays audio recording of Kenneth “admitting” being a child molester
Sheila is questioned about the event and gives police her suicide note
Investigators find other burn piles dating back to 2005 and find personalbelongings belonging to neither Sheila or Countie
Sheila meets up with Steve Martello and has sex with him
Sheila sent the Paquins a letter; Sheila has sex with Kenneth Washington inBoston
State fire marshals and an expert dog went to the scene of the crime anddetermined a body was burned on the mattress outside Sheila’s home
Peter Odom notifies Counties family on how he died and an arrest warrant forSheila was made
Washington attempts to call Boston police departments about Sheila; OfficerSteve Mascato confronts Sheila and she admits that she has been found
Sheila is arrested for the murders of Countie and Deloge
Court rules that there is probable cause to support the charge of first-degreemurder of Kenneth Countie
Sheila is denied bail by judge Patricia Coffey
Sheila is formally indicted for the murder of Kenneth Countie
Sheila changes her plea to not guilty by reason of insanity
Jury selection begins in Sheila’s murder trial
Trial for Sheila begins as she tries to convince the jury that she is legallyinsane
Sheila found guilty and judged to be sane

Graduated from Fort Payne High School in 1976

Her partners/lovers at the time of their relationship
